room_title: Escape room "Downtown Murder Mystery" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: My school district tried out the escape room as a team building experience. So much fun! My group went to the Murder room and escaped, with only two minutes left! Can't wait to go back and go through the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Downtown Murder Mystery" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: Our first time at an escape room. We tackled the Downtown Murder Mystery. Wow, it was awesome! Can't wait to try another!

room_title: Escape room "Downtown Murder Mystery" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: We did the Murder Mystery room for our faculty Christmas party and it was a blast! Fortunately for us, we had some guys smarter than me so we could solve the puzzles! Can't wait to come back!

room_title: Escape room "Downtown Murder Mystery" by Downtown Escape Rooms in Sherman
review: The Murder Mystery room was so unique... it was a blast. We could not have had a better time! Thank you Downtown Escape Room!
